<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Help others achieve their desires, aid and protect sex workers, help others through difficult transitions

<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)

**Favored Weapon** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=386)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=88), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=116)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)**

- **3rd**

- **4th**

</column>
